alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a ketone that is conjugated to a cyclic moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Cyclic ketones

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

class.description: Compounds containing a tropone ring, which is a cycloheptatrienone ring bearing a ketone group.
class.name: Tropones

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as tropolones. These are compounds containing tropone ring with a hydroxyl group at ring position 2.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing tropone ring with a hydroxyl group at ring position 2.
direct_parent.name: Tropolones

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing tropone ring with a hydroxyl group at ring position 2.
subclass.name: Tropolones

superclass.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
superclass.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives
